meanings.definition: Of or relating to appraisal or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: The appraisive report provided a detailed analysis of the property's value.

meanings.sent3: The appraisive cat sat on the table, seemingly pondering the value of the shiny trinket.
meanings.sent4: His appraisive gaze swept over the artwork, as if trying to uncover its hidden worth.
meanings.sent5: The appraisive process was thorough, leaving no stone unturned in determining the true value of the land.

meanings.sent1: The appraisive skills of the jeweler were evident in his precise evaluation of the diamond.
meanings.sent2: As a seasoned collector, she possessed an appraisive instinct for recognizing valuable items.
meanings.sent3: The appraisive squirrel carefully selected the ripest nuts from the tree, showing its keen judgment.
